verbose_text: Treatment with Rg1 (2 and 4 mg/kg) and RU486 significantly alleviated the histological changes, increased the expression of MAP2, and attenuated the neuronal injury in the frontal cortex and hippocampus CA1 and CA3.
evidence: Rg1 (2 and 4 mg/kg) and RU486 significantly alleviated the histological changes, increased the expression of MAP2, and attenuated the neuronal injury
